title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Georgia voting law lies. Rubio tells MLB commissioner Rob Manfred to forfeit his Augusta membership. Former MLB commissioner Vincent says it was a mistake to move All-Star game. Biden tells Georgia to "smarten up" to avoid boycotts. Rush was on the cutting edge of the politicization of sports, preached standing up to bully boycotts. Biden administration floats rebuilding Trump's wall because it works. Rush on the day Jim Acosta discovered the wall works. Poll shows neither party believes elections are fair. Rush lays out how Democrats undermined election integrity. California caller: Newsom recall threat changed his policies, proves we have power.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Justice Clarence Thomas opinion on tech monopolies. Big Tech resurrects the media monopoly Rush busted. Google, Facebook and Twitter have replaced the old Big Three: CBS, NBC, ABC. Rush praises Governor DeSantis leading the way in war on Big Tech, warns of the merger of Big Media and the state. Putin to remain in power for 15 more years. Rush praising Trump for tweaking media by congratulating Putin on reelection. Rush on the lure of Marxism. Georgia pushback frustrates Biden.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Schumer said Democrats were going to transform America – they transformed Georgia. Well, Georgia is pushing back. Rush warned us about Biden's Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm back when she was Michigan governor. Rush predicted the tax hikes that Cuomo had in store for New York. Brett outlines stories that prove Rush right: The Democrat Party has been a socialist party for years. Caller compares Rush to Sherlock Holmes, solving liberals. EIB's High Note: "Emotional Support Beer" Benefits Operation at Ease, a nonprofit that pairs shelter dogs with veterans and first responders. Liberals always move the goalposts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
